import "./product.css"; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup'; const Product = () => { return (

Research and Project Overview

AnalyzingWeb Application Vulnerability of Educational Institutions in Bangladesh This study aims to detect vulnerabilities of the educational websites in Bangladesh and analyze which scanning tool provides more accurate results. Contrast Enhancement of Low Light Image Here we discussed about enhancement of different low light images using Histogram Equalization (HE) and Illumination Adjustment. Krish-e An e-platform for farm mechanisation to improve food security and livelihood.User can make purchases an also sell their Agri-related commodities on this app. Puran-o PURAN-O is an online second hand book selling and buying app. In this application anyone can open an account where he can upload his copy of book to sell . Similarly, if anyone wants to buy any copy , he can just search it using his account. Jontro It is an e commerce App named jontro. Here an user can see available items, can add items to cart. After adding items, user can go to cart to see if the added items are there and increase or decrease the quantity. In checkout we need to provide address details. After payment we got a confirmation. Student Database This is a backend database application for students. It uses token bases authentication by generating a jwt token for token. It stores details of the the students.We can add,retrive,nodify and delete data from this application. Calculator This application runs regression testing and mutation testing on a simple calculator app. UI/UX Some practice UI mockup. This prototypes are responsive and include various features like navigation,Srolling,Finger print scanning.
); }; export default Product;
